datageneration

Class Documents

  • java.lang.Object
    • datageneration.Documents
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateDocuments, MergeDocuments

    public abstract class Documents
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that handles user documents for profiles and topic models

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Documents(java.lang.String target, CapstoneDBConnection con)
      Creates documents for each user and generates metrics.

      • makeDocuments

        protected abstract void makeDocuments(java.lang.String target)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.sql.SQLException
        Creates the documents for each user for the given target data. Each document consists of all a user's artifacts in a random order.
        Parameters:
        target - The type of documents to be generated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
